recommendations: ⚡ HIGH IMPACT: Address high-impact performance issues first
📦 Implement tree shaking and code splitting
🧹 Implement proper cleanup in useEffect hooks
🚀 Use React DevTools Profiler to identify bottlenecks
💾 Consider lazy loading for large components
🔧 Use production builds for performance testing
📈 Set up bundle analyzer for size optimization
⚡ Consider using React.Suspense for better UX
